title: Giro d’Italia Stage 19: Del Toro Fends Off Carapaz To Edge Closer to GC Victory
content:
Del Toro survives attritional stage across the Italian Alps to carry pink into the final mountain showdown in a Giro d'Italia still too close to call.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 19: Del Toro Fends Off Carapaz To Edge Closer to GC Victory on Velo.
author: ahood
